item.title: # whoami
item.description: I am El-Hachemi Guerrout, Professor at the Higher School of Computer Science ESI and also a member of the LMCS laboratory at ESI.

item.title: Contact Details
item.description: You can find below my contact details and important links: LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/el-hachemi-guerrout-31756357/ Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=Dbvc8CwAAAAJ Slideshare: https://www.slideshare.net/GuerroutElHachemi Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnQwHoUB-omb8qxUEMm2tfA You can contact me using this email
